subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Celtics center Kendrick Perkins, despite sitting out the fourth, finished with a career-high 24 points, 17 above his season average, and shot 9 of 12 from the field on Monday.
snippet: Celtics center Kendrick Perkins, despite sitting out the fourth, finished with a career-high 24 points, 17 above his season average, and shot 9 of 12 from the field on Monday.
